data.title: Break Up (1968)
data.meta_description: Mario (Marcello Mastroianni) is a rich owner of a candy factory and he’s about to marry Giovanna (Catherine Spaak). He conducts a boring life, until, after seeing one of his advertisement balloons, he decides to find out at which point a balloon can be inflated before it explodes.
data.text: Mario (Marcello Mastroianni) is a rich owner of a candy factory and he’s about to marry Giovanna (Catherine Spaak). He conducts a boring life, until, after seeing one of his advertisement balloons, he decides to find out at which point a balloon can be inflated before it explodes.
